sentences.en: On the monolayer in the absence of additives, the tri-dimensional prismy COM crystals precipitated.
sentences.cn: 没有添加剂时，得到的COM为三维的六棱柱和三维的菱形晶体；

sentences.en: The products can refraction of prismy colors; the entire product is translucent, colorful, gives a sense of dreaming…
sentences.cn: 整个产品可以折射出不同颜色的光线，整个产品是晶莹剔透，颜色丰富，五彩斑斓，给人一种如梦如幻的感觉。

sentences.en: The scales of the pangolin were composed of the very thin prismy construction units and the folded units.
sentences.cn: 穿山甲鳞片是由极细的棱柱结构单元和叠片结构单元混合形成的；

trans.tran_cn: 棱柱的，五光十色的，色彩缤纷
